title: Hot Trash
description: Six girls and guys are about to have one hot summer. They've been chosen to move to New York City and be interns on the new reality talk show Trash. But the real drama is going on behind the cameras.  Features the first two books in the series:  Trash Someone is making a secret video to expose the truth behind the Trash television show. Now, hard-nosed exec Rosanne is out for revenge--and one of the interns will pay.  Trash: Love, Lies and Video Intern Karma is in love with the most gorgeous male intern at Trash, and he's crazy about her--or is he mistaking her for someone else?
author: Cherie Bennett
